About Ethereum Messiah

Ethereum Messiah are celestial fox spirits with white fur and full, fluffy tails reminiscent of ripe grain.

The internet has unlocked unprecedented opportunities for collaboration and creation. Now name technology like open source protocols and decentralized blockchains give us the ability to take that co-creation to a new scale. The Gitcoin community uses this technology to fund and build digital public goods projects that serve everyone, and solve our most immediate problems.

Current Price

How to Buy $eMessiah

1. Create a MetaMask Wallet

$eMessiah token is available on the Ethereum blockchain. MetaMask is the market leader in ERC20 (Ethereum) wallets.

2. Send $eMessiah to MetaMask

Buy Ethereum through MetaMask or transfer it to your MetaMask wallet address from another wallet (e.g. Coinbase or Binance).

3. Visit Uniswap

The safest place to buy $eMessiah is on Uniswap. Visit Uniswap and click “connect wallet” MetaMask will ask for your signature, go ahead and sign it.

4. Swap $eMessiah

Set your slippage to 10% and enter the amount of $eMessiah you would like to swap for $eMessiah. Click Connect Wallet then Swap.

We Are Building a NFT Marketplace

Our goal with the NFT Marketplace is to work with the ASPCA to send our holders monthly NFT's of the different animals being rescued.

Roadmap

Phase 1

  • Website Launch
  • $eMessiah erc20 token launch on Ethereum Mainnet
  • Burn 15% of total supply to dead address
  • $eMessiah verification on Etherscan
  • Add liquidity on Uniswap

Phase 2

  • Website Redesign
  • $Extend Community 500+
  • $eMessiah listing on Coingecko, CoinMarketCap
  • $eMessiah CEX listings

Phase 3

  • $eMessiah swap exchange
  • $eMessiah Governance Token Launch
  • Expand Marketing + Management Team
  • Business Model for Paying Core & Developers

We support programs that create advancement opportunities for people.
